claim.text: California's AB 2011 (2022) streamlined approvals for housing on commercial sites statewide, including adaptive reuse
claim.claim: California passed AB 2011 in 2022, streamlining housing approvals on commercial sites statewide

results.summary: California AB 2011 (the Affordable Housing and High Road Jobs Act) was signed into law in September 2022 and does streamline housing approvals on commercial sites statewide.
results.detail: AB 2011 was authored by Assembly Member Buffy Wicks and signed by Governor Newsom on September 28, 2022. The law creates a ministerial (by-right) approval pathway for affordable and mixed-income housing on commercially zoned land, including strip malls, office parks, and parking lots. It includes labor standards and affordability requirements. The claim about adaptive reuse is accurate as the bill facilitates converting commercial properties to housing.
